Periamygdaloid cortex.EditorialNote: Both Brain Info and BrainMaps list the periamygdaloid area as a substructure of cortex (parahippocampal gyrus for Brain Info).  Needs review
Periamygdaloid cortex.Definition: Is located ventral to the basal nucleus and has three subdivisions: the periamygdaloid cortex, the medial division, and the sulcal division.
